<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>f87c0157-81b6-414e-923a-c4d7c0543852#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Rugalmas pontsoron terjedő hullámok</string>
            <string language="en">spreading waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ausgebreitete Wellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vagues de propagation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas espalhando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onde di diffusione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαδίδοντας κύματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ondas que se separan</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A hullámmozgás bevezetése, a hullámok fajtái, a hullámmozgást leíró mennyiségek, polarizáció</string>
            <string language="en">concept of waving motion, its kinds, typical values and polarisation</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">hullámok,  </string>
            <string language="en">waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konzept der wellenartig bewegenden Bewegung, 
seiner Arten, der typischen Werte und der Polarisation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">concept de mouvement ondulant, de ses sortes, de 
valeurs typiques et de polarisation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">conceito do movimento acenando, dos seus tipos, 
de valores típicos e de polarisation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">concetto di movimento d'ondeggiamento, dei 
relativi generi, dei valori tipici e della polarizzazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έννοια της κυματίζοντας κίνησης, των ειδών, των 
χαρακτηριστικών τιμών και της πόλωσής του</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">concepto del movimiento que agita, de sus clases, 
de valores típicos y de la polarización</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vagues</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ondas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
